headline: Constellation Brands, Inc. (STZ): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Constellation Brands, Inc. on Valueinvesting subreddit by raytoei. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on STZ. Constellation Brands, Inc.’s share was trading at $175.83 as of July 29th. STZ’s trailing and forward P/E were 18.50 and 13.76 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
